remarks: Relate left-Noetherian rings to Noetherian-type closure property of the left ideal system.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Apr-2015.)
statement:
islnr3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
islnr3.u $e |- U = ( LIdeal ` R ) $.
islnr3 $p |- ( R e. LNoeR <-> ( R e. Ring /\ U e. ( NoeACS ` B ) ) ) $.
